○ Tatyasaheb Kore Institute of Engineering and Technology (TKIET) established in 1983. 

○ The Institute is located at Warananagar, 30 km away from Kolhapur a district headquarter and 10 kms to the west from Kini-Wathar on Pune-Bangalore National Highway NH-4. 

○ TKIET has emerged as one of the leading technological institutes in Western Maharashtra. 

○ The Institute has a Lush-green campus spread over 30 acres in the picturesque foothill of Lord Jyotiba and historical Panhala Fort to the north-east.
